text: Lim Yin Fun (born 13 November 1994) is a Malaysian badminton player. In 2016, she became the runner-up at the Romanian and Vietnam International Series tournament in the women's singles event. == Achievements == === BWF International Challenge/Series === Women's singles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" ! title: Lim Yin Fun
